resources.string: Private key never leave your device
In the next step you will see 12 words taht allows you to recover a wallet.
I understand that if I lose my recovery words,I will not be able to access my wallet.
Write down or copy these words in the right order and them somewhere safe.
Tap the word to put them next to each other in the correct order.
Never share recovery phrase with anyone,store it securely!
Send only Bitcoin to this address.
Sending anyother coins may result in payment loss.
Get alert for significant price changes of your favrite cryptocurrencies
